dmca.title: RE: DMCA Complaint from Rolex w
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 31, 2005 3:48 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Rolex w

May 31, 2005
 
        Re: Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc.
 
To Legal Response Team:
 
    We are in receipt of your letter dated May 27, 2005 concerning the web
site www.replicacastle.com.  We have reviewed the site and confirmed that
The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc. is no longer the ISP.  We appreciate
your cooperation and thank you for your assistance in this matter.
 
Sincerely,
 
Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]
Sent: Friday, May 27, 2005 11:44 AM
To: Gaf Counsel; legalresponse2@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Rolex w


To Whom It May Concern:



This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.



Legal Response Team

The Planet




---------


From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com]

Sent: Monday, May 23, 2005 12:52 PM

To: abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com;
legal-response@theplanet.com

Subject: RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.



May 23, 2005





BY EMAIL: abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com;
copyright@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com AND FIRST CLASS MAIL
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, Texas 75207



RE:  ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.



To ThePlanet.com:



This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"), the
owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX, PRESIDENT,
SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device
(among others).



We are writing to request your assistance with a website hosted by your
service that is selling counterfeit Rolex products.



The www.replicacastle.com website offers counterfeit and infringing Rolex
watches for sale.  Such illegal use of the Rolex Trademarks is likely to
cause confusion and constitutes counterfeiting, trademark infringement and
dilution of Rolex's intellectual property rights in violation of both
federal and state laws. 



Pursuant to ThePlanet.com's policies and the requirements of The Digital
Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") 1, please note the following: 



1. Signature of the undersigned set forth below.



2. www.replicacastle.com is offering for sale counterfeit Rolex merchandise
and the offer for sale and the sale of counterfeit merchandise is prohibited
by federal law (15 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP (for Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc.)
